job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates understanding and improving business processes, which aligns with aligning technical solutions with business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkel en implementeer je oplossingen en strategieën die aansluiten op hun specifieke uitdagingen en doelstellingen
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to understanding client challenges and objectives and developing strategies to meet them.

job_tasks.phrase: draag je bij aan de vertaalslag van strategische doelen naar praktische, duurzame resultaten
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the translation of business strategy into actionable technical outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: Je geeft workshops waarin je bedrijven laat zien hoe generatieve AI hun bedrijfsdoelen kan ondersteunen
job_tasks.justification: This involves educating businesses on how generative AI can support their goals, requiring a business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Je analyseert klantbehoeften en ontwikkelt strategische roadmaps gericht op generatieve AI
job_tasks.justification: Analyzing customer needs and developing strategic roadmaps directly falls under understanding business requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: jouw kennis van generatieve AI in te zetten
job_tasks.justification: This indicates direct application of generative AI knowledge, which is core to modeling.
This implies building and putting into practice AI solutions, which involves software development.
While strategy is business-focused, the development aspect here implies creating plans for AI implementation, touching on practical application which often involves software.

job_tasks.phrase: Projectmanagement en Implementatie: Je leidt de implementatie van AI-oplossingen en zorgt voor een naadloze integratie in bestaande systemen
job_tasks.justification: Leading implementation and ensuring seamless integration points to software development and deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: begeleid je klanten stap voor stap bij het gebruik van deze technologie
job_tasks.justification: Guiding clients in using technology suggests a role in the application and integration of software.
Ensuring seamless integration implies a focus on operational aspects of deploying AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: begeleid je klanten stap voor stap bij het gebruik van deze technologie
job_tasks.justification: Supporting clients post-implementation and guiding them on usage relates to operational support and adoption.

soft_skills.phrase: Je werkt zowel zelfstandig als in teamverband

vertaalslag van strategische doelen naar praktische, duurzame resultaten
waarbij verantwoord en ethisch gebruik centraal staat

classification.rationale: The job description strongly emphasizes the application of generative AI to improve business processes and develop strategies. Key responsibilities include advising clients, developing AI strategies, and leading implementation, all centered around generative AI.
